meanings.sent1: The unblinkered horse could see all around without any restrictions.
meanings.sent2: She admired his unblinkered view of the world, free from any narrow-mindedness.
meanings.sent3: The unblinkered driver navigated through traffic with ease, never missing a turn.
meanings.sent4: Her unblinkered approach to problem-solving allowed her to find creative solutions.
meanings.sent5: The unblinkered detective noticed the smallest details that others overlooked.

meanings.definition: Not limited or restricted in perspective or awareness
meanings.sent1: His unblinkered mind was open to new ideas and possibilities.
meanings.sent2: The unblinkered student considered all angles before making a decision.
meanings.sent3: The unblinkered explorer discovered hidden treasures in the jungle.
meanings.sent4: Her unblinkered imagination led to groundbreaking innovations in technology.
meanings.sent5: The unblinkered scientist uncovered a revolutionary theory through careful observation.
